faqs.question: What documentation is necessary when purchasing a ready to move flat
faqs.answer: When purchasing a ready to move Flat For Sale in Devi Nagar, you must ensure the seller provides crucial documentation. Key documents include the Sale Deed, Mother Deed, Occupancy Certificate OC which certifies the building is fit for habitation, Completion Certificate CC, the approved building plan, and encumbrance certificate. If the flat is resold, the chain of previous sales deeds is also required. Our legal team assists in verifying all these documents thoroughly before closing the deal.
